title: 3rd Place Solution Part
description: 3rd Place Solution Part: BestGuess + OptimizerMain architecture:  Hi all, thanks for the really interesting competition. I quickly want to share my solution. It is split up into 2 main blocks:  BestGuess, which is an iterative neural network approach. It predicts the start state for delta=1. Repeating it delta times for delta>1 And an Optimizer, which picks a random 3x3 reagion in the input, tries every possible combination of the 3x3 grid at once and selects randomly between the ones which produce the lowest score. It is entirely implemented on the GPU.  This approach reached a score of 0.018 before merging.
